name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Proficient Senior Solution Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing scalable backend systems with a strong emphasis on microservices architecture and DevOps practices. Expert in leveraging **AWS**, **GitLab CI**, and **CI/CD** pipelines to enhance deployment efficiency. Skilled in designing micro-frontend solutions and utilizing frontend technologies such as **React** and **vite** alongside backend development using **Kotlin** and **Spring Boot**. Proven ability in implementing **Test Driven Development (TDD)** and **MLOps** strategies to ensure high-quality software delivery. Strong background in utilizing monitoring tools like **Prometheus**, **Kibana**, and **Grafana** to maintain system health and performance. Known for coaching and mentoring teams on **Domain Driven Design** principles and best practices, and delivering impactful projects for top-tier organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

Utilized **GitLab CI** for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) processes to deliver high-quality software efficiently, achieving a deployment frequency increase of **30%**.
Engineered and deployed microservices architecture using **AWS**, enhancing scalability and performance of applications by achieving a **25%** reduction in response time.
Implemented **Micro-Frontend** architecture with **React**, **vite**, and **module federation** to promote modular development, leading to a **40%** improvement in front-end team productivity.
Adopted **Test Driven Development (TDD)** practices, ensuring robust test coverage with a goal of achieving **90%** unit test coverage in critical components.
Leveraged **Prometheus**, **Kibana**, and **Grafana** for monitoring and visualization, setting up alerts that reduced downtime incidents by **15%**.
Mentored and coached junior engineers on **Domain Driven Design** principles in adherence to best practices, fostering professional growth within the team.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **Spring Boot** solutions for backend operations, enhancing overall system performance and reliability.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamlining user onboarding and handling complex reporting processes, achieving a **30%** reduction in processing time.
• Created event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, resulting in **50%** faster response times for transaction handling.
• Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation; successfully maintained consistent and scalable environments, facilitating deployment for **10** active services.
• Engineered data pipelines for secure exchange of regulatory data using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, automating data flow and ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.
• Performed security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards; integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and securing access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management, enhancing collaboration across **3** teams.
• Trained and mentored junior team members on best practices for **DevOps**, **CI/CD**, and code quality, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

• Leveraged **AWS** for deploying and managing **Microservices** architecture, ensuring scalable and reliable backend services.
• Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitLab CI**, enhancing deployment processes and reducing release time by **30%**.
• Developed and integrated **React**-based **Micro-Frontend** components to improve user interaction while maintaining performance metrics across applications.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with regulatory standards including MiFID II and GDPR, establishing best practices for security.
• Designed and executed **Test Driven Development** (TDD) methodologies using **PyTest** and **tox**, increasing code coverage to **85%** and improving overall code quality.
• Engineered real-time data streaming features using **Redis**, enhancing system responsiveness for trading applications, resulting in a performance boost of **40%** in data handling.
• Optimized backend processes by implementing **Celery** and **RabbitMQ** for effective job scheduling and queuing, thereby improving task management efficiency.
• Provided coaching and mentoring on emerging technologies such as **Kotlin** and **GitHub Copilot**, contributing to team skill enhancement and adoption of best practices.
